import React from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; class FormSignup extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { username: '', email: '', password:'', password2: '' } } onNameChange(event) { this.setState({username: event.target.value}) } onEmailChange(event) { this.setState({email: event.target.value}) } onSubjectChange(event) { this.setState({password: event.target.value}) } onMsgChange(event) { this.setState({password2: event.target.value}) } render() { return (

); } } export default FormSignup;
